00014 template<class T>
00015 sqlite3* CachingLogReader<T>::fDB = NULL;
00016 template<class T>
00017 sqlite3_stmt*  CachingLogReader<T>::fSelectStmt = NULL;
00018 template<class T>
00019 sqlite3_stmt*  CachingLogReader<T>::fInsertStmt = NULL;
00020 
00021 
00022 template<class T>
00023 CachingLogReader<T>::CachingLogReader()
00024 {
00025    if (!fDB)
00026    {
00027       if (sqlite3_open("cdev_cache.sqlite", &fDB) != SQLITE_OK)
00028       {
00029          gSystem->Error("CachingLogReader", "Can't open cdev cache");
00030       }
00031       const char *sql = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cache (query TEXT PRIMARY KEY, response TEXT);";
00032       int ret = sqlite3_exec(fDB, sql, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00033       if (ret != SQLITE_OK)
00034       {
00035          gSystem->Error("CachingLogReader", "sqlite error: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(fDB));
00036       }
00037       char select_query[] = "SELECT response FROM cache WHERE query = ? LIMIT 1;";
00038       ret = sqlite3_prepare_v2(fDB, select_query, sizeof(select_query), &fSelectStmt, NULL);
00039       if (ret != SQLITE_OK)
00040       {
00041          gSystem->Error("CachingLogReader", "Error preparing select_query: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(fDB));
00042       }
00043       const char insert_query[] = "INSERT INTO cache (query, response) VALUES (?, ?);";
00044       ret = sqlite3_prepare_v2(fDB, insert_query, sizeof(insert_query), &fInsertStmt, NULL);
00045       if (ret != SQLITE_OK)
00046       {
00047          gSystem->Error("CachingLogReader", "Error preparing insert_query: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(fDB));
00048       }
00049    }
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 template<class T>
00054 CachingLogReader<T>::~CachingLogReader()
00055 {
00056    if (fDB)
00057    {
00058       sqlite3_close(fDB);
00059       fDB = NULL;
00060    }
00061 }

00063 
00064 template<class T>
00065 void CachingLogReader<T>::Run(string cmd, opencdev::result_t *values)
00066 {
00067    int ret;
00068    sqlite3_reset(fSelectStmt);
00069    sqlite3_bind_text(fSelectStmt, 1, cmd.c_str(), cmd.size(), SQLITE_STATIC);
00070 
00071    ret = sqlite3_step(fSelectStmt);
00072    if (ret == SQLITE_ROW)
00073    {
00074       T::Read((const char*)sqlite3_column_text(fSelectStmt, 0), values);
00075    }
00076    else if (ret == SQLITE_DONE)
00077    {
00078       gSystem->Error("CachingLogReader", "Query result is not in cache, retreiving via ssh.");
00079 
00080       string response;
00081       T::ExecuteCmd(cmd, &response);
00082 
00083       sqlite3_reset(fInsertStmt);
00084       sqlite3_bind_text(fInsertStmt, 1, cmd.c_str(), cmd.size(), SQLITE_STATIC);
00085       sqlite3_bind_text(fInsertStmt, 2, response.c_str(), response.size(), SQLITE_STATIC);
00086       if (sqlite3_step(fInsertStmt) != SQLITE_DONE)
00087       {
00088          gSystem->Error("CachingLogReader", "sqlite error: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(fDB));
00089       }
00090       gSystem->Info("CachingLogReader", "Saved data to SQLite cache");
00091 
00092       T::Read(response, values);
00093    }
00094    else
00095    {
00096       throw sqlite3_errmsg(fDB);
00097    }
00098 }
